entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Caledon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.7°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers late this evening and after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
